result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Morgan Lee Rocque

records.addlTxt: Scheduling conference on December 21, 2022 at 09:00 am.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt:
2:04 pm - Prosecuting attorney Jordan W. Feest in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Morgan Lee Rocque in court.  Attorney Jacob M. Blazkovec in court for Morgan Lee Rocque. Defendant waives their right to a preliminary hearing.  Defendant is bound over to Circuit Court Branch 2 for trial.
ARRAIGNMENT - 
Information to be filed by the State.
Not guilty plea(s) entered.  Jury calendar.
Offer deadline: 09-09-22
Scheduling conference is set for  10-19-22 at 9:00 a.m.
Further proceedings scheduled for September 9, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Scheduling conference scheduled for October 19, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Scheduling conference on October 19, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Further proceedings on September 9, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant states he has Attorney Jacob Blascovic as counsel.   Initial appearance is reset to 08-01-22 at 1:30 p.m.   
Minutes.

BAIL HEARING - 
Defendant in custody and appearing by video from the Manitowoc County Jail.  The State informs the Court that the defendant will be charged with the crime of felony bail jumping.  The matter is continued for initial appearance on 07-18-22 at 1:30 p.m.  Bail is set at $1,000.00 recognizance bond with the conditions that defendant is not to operate a motor vehicle without a valid license.  Bail furnished and defendant is released from custody.
Minutes.
